Suggested_Setup: A campsite left in a hurry. Food is still warm. No tracks lead away.
A body found with strange markings or gear not from this region.
A warning or code scrawled on a wall in fresh paint/blood.
An item (clock, doll, weapon) that hums or moves on its own.
Players hear a battle or conversation that happened years ago (echo).
A container/door marked "Do Not Open" is found forced open from the inside.
A map found on a body shows a landmark that doesn't exist anymore.
Players notice the same symbol appearing in nature (rocks, trees).
A lone survivor of a disaster who is in shock and speaking gibberish.
A patch of snow in the desert, or a tropical tree in the tundra.
A machine from a lost era is running, counting down to something.
A player finds a Wanted poster or portrait that looks exactly like them.
Crates marked with a royal seal are found hidden in a ditch.
Candles, chalk circles, and reagents arranged for a spell that wasn't finished.
A small statue that whispers truths/lies to whoever holds it.
A bridge or vehicle was deliberately rigged to fail (cut ropes, loose bolts).
A journal detailing a descent into madness or a discovery of a secret.
Tracks that start in the middle of a clearing and vanish abruptly.
A light in the distance that blinks a coded message.
People/animals turned to stone or encased in amber mid-action.
